info.title: Google Sheets API Methods
info.description: This specification enables interaction with the Google Sheets API by exposing both compound and individual operations. Each flow is defined clearly so that method callers or embedding-based search can easily match the functionality to operations such as creating spreadsheets, retrieving data, or updating cell values.

flows.title: Create Spreadsheet
flows.description: Creates a new Google Spreadsheet with specified properties and formatting options.

schema.description: Spreadsheet resource definition. Include properties such as title, sheets, and formatting options.

success.description: The newly created spreadsheet resource including its spreadsheetId.

flows.title: Get Spreadsheet
flows.description: Retrieves details of an existing Google Spreadsheet using its spreadsheetId.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the spreadsheet.

success.description: Spreadsheet details including properties and sheet information.

flows.title: Get Developer Metadata
flows.description: Retrieves developer metadata from a spreadsheet using its metadataId.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The identifier of the spreadsheet where metadata is stored.

parameters.name: metadataId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the developer metadata.

success.description: Developer metadata details.

flows.title: Search Developer Metadata
flows.description: Searches for developer metadata in a spreadsheet using specified criteria.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The identifier of the spreadsheet to search in.

items.description: A filter specifying metadata search criteria.

success.description: Results containing matching developer metadata.

flows.title: Copy Sheet
flows.description: Copies a sheet from one spreadsheet to another.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the source spreadsheet.

parameters.name: sheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the sheet to copy.

schema.description: Destination details for the copy operation.

destinationSpreadsheetId.description: The ID of the destination spreadsheet.

success.description: Information about the copied sheet.

flows.title: Get Spreadsheet Values
flows.description: Retrieves cell values from a specified range in a spreadsheet.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to read from.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The range (in A1 notation) to retrieve values from.

success.description: The cell values from the specified range.

flows.title: Update Spreadsheet Values
flows.description: Updates cell values in a specified range of a spreadsheet.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to update.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The range (in A1 notation) where values will be updated.

parameters.name: valueInputOption
parameters.description: How the input data should be interpreted. Accepted values are: RAW or USER_ENTERED

schema.description: New cell values for the update operation.

values.description: An array of rows with new values.

success.description: The update result including the number of updated cells.

flows.title: Append Spreadsheet Values
flows.description: Appends new rows of cell values to a specified range in a spreadsheet.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to append to.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The target range for appending new rows.

parameters.name: valueInputOption
parameters.description: How the input data should be interpreted. Accepted values are: RAW or USER_ENTERED

values.description: An array of rows to append.

success.description: The result of the append operation showing the number of updated cells.

flows.title: Clear Spreadsheet Values
flows.description: Clears all cell values from a specified range in a spreadsheet.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to clear.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The range (in A1 notation) to clear.

success.description: The final clear operation output.

flows.title: Batch Clear Spreadsheet Values
flows.description: Clears cell values from multiple ranges in one batch request.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The spreadsheet identifier for the batch clear operation.

schema.description: The list of ranges to clear.

ranges.description: An array of ranges in A1 notation.

success.description: The result of the batch clear operation.

flows.title: Batch Get Spreadsheet Values
flows.description: Retrieves cell values from multiple ranges in one batch request.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The spreadsheet identifier to retrieve data from.

parameters.name: majorDimension
parameters.description: The major dimension that results should use. For example, if the spreadsheet data is: A1:B1,A2:B2, then requesting majorDimension=ROWS will return a response with two rows of values. The caller can specify the major dimension by setting the dimensions parameter. For example, if the spreadsheet data is: A1:B1,A2:B2, then requesting dimensions=ROWS will return a response with two rows of values. The caller can specify the major dimension by setting the dimensions parameter.

schema.description: The list of ranges to retrieve values from.

ranges.description: An array of ranges in A1 notation.

items.description: A range in A1 notation like 'Sheet1!A1:B2'

success.description: The batch get result containing multiple ranges.

flows.title: Batch Get Values by Data Filter
flows.description: Retrieves cell values using dynamic data filters to select ranges.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The spreadsheet ID to query.

schema.description: Data filters to select ranges from which to retrieve values.

items.description: A filter specifying what data should be selected or returned from a request.

gridRange.description: A grid range on a sheet.

developerMetadataLookup.description: Selects data associated with the developer metadata matching the criteria

a1Range.description: Selects data that matches the specified A1 range.

success.description: The result containing values for the selected ranges.

flows.title: Batch Update Spreadsheet Values
flows.description: Updates multiple ranges in a spreadsheet with new values in one batch request.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The spreadsheet ID to update.

schema.description: A list of update requests for spreadsheet values.

items.description: An update request specifying a range and new values.

values.description: The new values as an array of rows.

success.description: The result of the batch update operation.

flows.title: Batch Update Values by Data Filter
flows.description: Updates spreadsheet values based on dynamic data filters in one batch operation.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The spreadsheet ID where updates will be applied.

schema.description: Data filters and new values for updating ranges.

valueInputOption.description: How the input data should be interpreted.

data.description: The data to write. If more than one range is matched by the specified DataFilter the specified values are applied to all of those ranges.

items.description: A range of values whose location is specified by a DataFilter.

dataFilter.description: A filter that describes what data should be selected.

gridRange.description: A grid range on a sheet.

developerMetadataLookup.description: Selects data associated with the developer metadata matching the criteria

a1Range.description: Selects data that matches the specified A1 range.

majorDimension.description: The major dimension of the values.

values.description: The data to be written. If the provided values exceed any of the ranges matched by the data filter then the request fails. If the provided values are less than the matched ranges only the specified values are written, existing values in the matched ranges remain unaffected.

success.description: The result of the batch update by data filter operation.

flows.title: Batch Update Spreadsheet
flows.description: Executes multiple update operations on a spreadsheet in one batch request.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet to update.

schema.description: A list of update requests for spreadsheet modifications.

title.description: The new title for the sheet.

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to update.

success.description: The results of the batch update operation.

flows.title: Get Spreadsheet by Data Filter
flows.description: Retrieves spreadsheet data based on specified data filters.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The spreadsheet identifier.

schema.description: Data filters specifying which parts of the spreadsheet to retrieve.

items.description: A filter specifying what data should be selected or returned from a request.

gridRange.description: A grid range on a sheet.

developerMetadataLookup.description: Selects data associated with the developer metadata matching the criteria

a1Range.description: Selects data that matches the specified A1 range.

success.description: Spreadsheet data matching the provided filters.

flows.title: Create and Initialize Spreadsheet
flows.description: Creates a new spreadsheet and appends initial data, resulting in a ready-to-use spreadsheet.

schema.description: Combined request body for creating and initializing a spreadsheet.

range.description: The range in A1 notation where data will be appended.

values.description: An array of rows to append.

valueInputOption.description: How the input data should be interpreted. Accepted values are: RAW or USER_ENTERED

success.description: Final output including the spreadsheet ID and the result of appending initial data.

spreadsheetId.description: The ID of the created spreadsheet.

flows.title: Read and Clear Spreadsheet Values
flows.description: Reads cell values from a specified range and then clears them.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the spreadsheet.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The range (in A1 notation) to read and clear.

success.description: Final output from the clear operation.

flows.title: Batch Update and Retrieve Values
flows.description: Performs a batch update on a spreadsheet and then retrieves the updated values.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The spreadsheet ID for update and retrieval.

schema.description: A list of update requests for the batch update.

valueInputOption.description: The input option for the update request. Accepted values are: RAW or USER_ENTERED

items.description: An update request specifying a range and new values.

values.description: The new values as an array of rows.

success.description: Final output containing the updated values.

valueRanges.description: Array of value ranges retrieved after update.

flows.title: Copy Sheet and Update Values
flows.description: Copies a sheet from one spreadsheet to another and then updates values in the copied sheet.

parameters.name: sourceSpreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the source spreadsheet.

parameters.name: sheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the sheet to copy.

parameters.name: destinationSpreadsheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the destination spreadsheet.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The range in the destination spreadsheet to update.

schema.description: Destination details for copying the sheet.

success.description: Final output containing information about the copied sheet and the update result.

sheetId.description: The ID of the copied sheet.

title.description: The title of the copied sheet.

updateResult.description: The result of updating values in the copied sheet.

flows.title: Batch Clear Spreadsheet Values by Data Filter
flows.description: Clears cell values from multiple ranges in one batch request based on specified data filters.

parameters.name: spreadsheetId
parameters.description: The spreadsheet identifier for the batch clear operation.

schema.description: Data filters to select ranges from which to clear values.

items.description: A filter specifying what data should be selected or returned from a request.

gridRange.description: A grid range on a sheet.

developerMetadataLookup.description: Selects data associated with the developer metadata matching the criteria

a1Range.description: Selects data that matches the specified A1 range.

success.description: The result of the batch clear by data filter operation.
